item.title: Adding color-blind themes to Kubecolor to make Kubernetes more inclusive
item.description: Kubcolor is a thin wrapper over the kubectl command that adds coloring to the output. I cloned the project and started maintaining it back in 2022 when the original author wasn’t active anymore. KubeColor can reformats the output of most kubectl commands to add colors and clarity. It makes it so easier to read the output that I still don’t understand that it’s not more widely used. I actually gave a lightning talk about it at the KubeCon’s Cloud Native Reject Europe 2024 in Paris if you want a video pitch.
